heading: 1.1 About the project
text:
Figure 1.1: Block diagram BioNES
BioNES (Biofeedback Nintendo Entertainment System) open-source plug--play MATLAB-based tool use NES games multimodal biofeedback. can used deliver HRV biofeedback via game designed NES system. can receive real-time heartbeat interval (RR) values Arduino + ear-clip PPG sensor (sensor capable send real-time heart rate pulses Arduino). acquisition, computes real-time heart rate heart rate variability (HRV), biofeedback parameters sends feedback FCEUX emulator used play NES game.
Besides -game biofeedback, also offers real-time data visualization time-series plots local saving data offline analysis. tool can benefit researchers (especially biofeedback physiological measurement domain) hobbyist, want quickly deploy biofeedback system, want explore NES games biofeedback, just want record physiological signals.

heading: 1.4 Why this tool?
text:
Biofeedback therapy potential benefits managing stress. However, traditional biofeedback expensive monotonous process. increase engagement biofeedback sessions, video games can used. problem limited availability affordable video-game-based biofeedback solutions.
BioNES developed keeping mind cost-effectiveness ease use deliver biofeedback simultaneously providing reliability research tool flexibility allow researchers/developers modify per needs. efficacy BioNES validated using observational study paper currently review reputed journal.
